description: HTML5 Piano Pro is a beautifully designed, interactive web-based piano that lets you play, record, and explore music right from your browser. Built for musicians, creators, and casual users alike, it features a responsive keyboard, playback controls, tempo adjustment, and MIDI file support — all wrapped in a sleek, immersive UI
name: HTML5 Piano Pro
